tidbits.title: Angkor Temples
tidbits.description: Cambodia is home to the magnificent Angkor Archaeological Park, featuring iconic temples like Angkor Wat, a UNESCO World Heritage Site and a testament to the Khmer Empire's grandeur.

tidbits.title: Cultural Richness
tidbits.description: Cambodia's cultural heritage spans ancient traditions, traditional Apsara dance, Khmer cuisine, and resilient spirit despite a complex history.

tidbits.title: Riverside Capital
tidbits.description: Phnom Penh, the capital, is situated along the Mekong River, offering a blend of colonial architecture, bustling markets, and poignant historical sites like the Killing Fields.
